job_tasks.phrase: improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation
job_tasks.justification: Automation of infrastructure tasks falls under the broader umbrella of software development practices applied to infrastructure.
Implementing and integrating new technologies into existing systems is a software development activity.
This phrase directly relates to the operational aspects of managing systems and infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: building and expanding (new) systems and platforms
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation and growth of technical systems and platforms, a core software development activity.
Modifying and improving existing technical infrastructure aligns with software development and system enhancement.

job_tasks.phrase: infra delivery to our internal customers
job_tasks.justification: Delivering infrastructure services to customers is a software development and operational responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: carrying out life cycle management of systems and software
job_tasks.justification: Managing the entire lifecycle of systems and software is a key aspect of software engineering and operations.

job_tasks.phrase: working with Delivery & contract managers, Product Owners and Project managers
job_tasks.justification: This involves collaboration with business stakeholders to understand requirements and manage projects.

job_tasks.phrase: responsible for managing several external suppliers
job_tasks.justification: Managing suppliers requires understanding business relationships and contracts to ensure service delivery.

soft_skills.phrase: working with Delivery & contract managers, Product Owners and Project managers
improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation and the use of new technologies
responsible for managing several external suppliers

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on infrastructure improvement, automation, and operations. There is no mention of generative AI, LLMs, or related generative modeling tasks, which are central to the GenAI Engineer profile. The responsibilities are more aligned with traditional IT operations and software development for infrastructure.
